item.title: Fixed default values when creating new entries
item.description: ##14:15 Monday 01 December 2014 JST## I updated the hakyll-new-post definition to give default values for the date when I creat a new journal entry. Now instead of having to look up the date and enter it, I just hit enter (three times) and it enters the date components. Thanks to this answer on SO, my code features read-string which can take default values: (defun hakyll-new-post (title tags yyyy mm dd) "Create a new Hakyll post for today with TITLE and TAGS.
